Quick Answers

How do I get started?

Download the app from the App Store or Google Play, create an account, and start downloading AI models to run on your device.

Is my data private?

Yes! All AI processing happens entirely on your device. We never see your conversations or prompts. Read our Privacy Policy.

What devices are supported?

AIAgentPals works on modern iOS (iPhone/iPad) and Android devices with sufficient RAM and storage for AI models.

What's the pricing?

We offer a free Starter tier and one-time purchase upgrades (Pro $9, Power User $39). Check our pricing page.

How fast is inference?

Speed depends on your device and model size. Modern phones can achieve 30-50+ tokens/second with quantized models.

Still have questions? Email us at
support@aiagentpals.com

We typically respond within 24-48 hours during business days.
